name: TokenizeInArchiveTask
description: Allows you to tokenize within an archive without unpacking.
author: Solidify Labs

inputs.name: Packages
inputs.label: Archive file filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: The archive files to search for e.g. somefile.zip or *.zip. This is used in Get-ChildItem as -Include

inputs.name: FilesToTokenize
inputs.label: Configuration file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filename or regex to find correct files within the archives to run tokenization replacement on. This is used in PS file.FullName -match.

inputs.name: ReplaceWithEmpty
inputs.label: Replace with empty values
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default keeps the token, when checked then it will replace with empty values.
